00030 /**
00031  * Smarty template class
00032  * 
00033  * The goal of the class is to provide TYPO3 with the functionnalities of
00034  * Smarty (htto://www.smarty.net/).
00035  *
00036  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00037  * @version     1.0
00038  * @package     TYPO3
00039  * @subpackage  oop
00040  */
00041 class tx_oop_Template_File
00042 {
00043     /**
00044      * Wether the static variables are set or not
00045      */
00046     protected static $_hasStatic    = false;
00047     
00048     /**
00049      * The Smarty cache directory
00050      */
00051     protected static $_cacheDir     = '';
00052     
00053     /**
00054      * The Smarty compiled templates directory
00055      */
00056     protected static $_compiledDir  = '';
00057     
00058     /**
00059      * The Smarty object
00060      */
00061     protected $_smarty              = NULL;
00062     
00063     /**
00064      * The template directory
00065      */
00066     protected $_tmplDir             = '';
00067     
00068     /**
00069      * Class constructor
00070      * 
00071      * @return  NULL
00072      * @see     _setStaticVars
00073      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the cache directory does not exist
00074      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the cache directory is not writeable
00075      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the compiled templates directory does not exist
00076      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the compiled templates directory is not writeable
00077      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the Smarty class file does not exist
00078      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the Smarty class is not defined
00079      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the template directory for the module does not exists
00080      */
00081     public function __construct( $tmplDir )
00082     {
00083         // Checks if the static variables are set
00084         if( !self::$_hasStatic ) {
00085             
00086             // Sets the static variables
00087             self::_setStaticVars();
00088             
00089             // Checks if the cache directory exists
00090             if( !file_exists( self::$_cacheDir ) || !is_dir( self::$_cacheDir ) ) {
00091                 
00092                 // Error - The cache directory does not exist
00093                 throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00094                     'The Smarty cache directory does not exist (path: ' . self::$_cacheDir . ')',
00095                     tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_DIRECTORY
00096                 );
00097             }
00098             
00099             // Checks if the cache directory is writeable
00100             if( !is_writeable( self::$_cacheDir ) ) {
00101                 
00102                 // Error - The cache directory is not writeable
00103                 throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00104                     'The Smarty cache directory is not writeable (path: ' . self::$_cacheDir . ')',
00105                     tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_DIRECTORY_NOT_WRITEABLE
00106                 );
00107             }
00108             
00109             // Checks if the compiled templates directory exists
00110             if( !file_exists( self::$_compiledDir ) || !is_dir( self::$_compiledDir ) ) {
00111                 
00112                 // Error - The compiled templates directory does not exist
00113                 throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00114                     'The Smarty compiled templates directory does not exist (path: ' . self::$_compiledDir . ')',
00115                     tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_DIRECTORY
00116                 );
00117             }
00118             
00119             // Checks if the compiled templates directory is writeable
00120             if( !is_writeable( self::$_compiledDir ) ) {
00121                 
00122                 // Error - The compiled templates directory is not writeable
00123                 throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00124                     'The Smarty compiled templates directory is not writeable (path: ' . self::$_compiledDir . ')',
00125                     tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_DIRECTORY_NOT_WRITEABLE
00126                 );
00127             }
00128             
00129             // Path to the Smarty class
00130             $smartyPath = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( 'oop' )
00131                         . 'res'
00132                         . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR
00133                         . 'php'
00134                         . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR
00135                         . 'smarty'
00136                         . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR
00137                         . 'Smarty.class.php';
00138             
00139             // Checks if the Smarty class file exists
00140             if( !file_exists( $smartyPath ) ) {
00141                 
00142                 // Error - The class file does not exists
00143                 throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00144                     'The Smarty class file does not exist (path: ' . $smartyPath . ')',
00145                     tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_SMARTY_CLASS_FILE
00146                 );
00147             }
00148             
00149             // Includes the Smarty class file
00150             require_once( $smartyPath );
00151             
00152             // Checks if the Smarty class is defined
00153             if( !class_exists( 'Smarty' ) ) {
00154                 
00155                 // Error - The Smarty class in not defined
00156                 throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00157                     'The Smarty class is not defined in file ' . $smartyPath . ')',
00158                     tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_SMARTY_CLASS
00159                 );
00160             }
00161         }
00162         
00163         // Checks if the templates directory exists
00164         if( !file_exists( $tmplDir ) || !is_dir( $tmplDir ) ) {
00165             
00166             // Error - The template directory does not exist
00167             throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00168                 'The template directory does not exist (path: ' . $tmplDir . ')',
00169                 tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_DIRECTORY
00170             );
00171         }
00172         
00173         // Stores the template directory
00174         $this->_tmplDir              = $tmplDir;
00175         
00176         // Creates the Smarty instance
00177         $this->_smarty               = new Smarty();
00178         
00179         // Sets the Smarty directories
00180         $this->_smarty->template_dir = $this->_tmplDir;
00181         $this->_smarty->compile_dir  = self::$_compiledDir;
00182         $this->_smarty->cache_dir    = self::$_cacheDir;
00183     }
00184     
00185     /**
00186      * Sets the needed static variables
00187      * 
00188      * @return  NULL
00189      * @see     Oop_Core_ClassManager::getInstance
00190      */
00191     private static function _setStaticVars()
00192     {
00193         // Sets the Smarty directories
00194         self::$_cacheDir     = t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_oop/smarty/cache/' );
00195         self::$_compiledDir  = t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_oop/smarty/compiled/' );
00196         
00197         // Static variables are set
00198         self::$_hasStatic    = true;
00199     }
00200     
00201     /**
00202      * PHP method calls overloading
00203      * 
00204      * This method will reroute all the call on this object to the PDO object.
00205      * 
00206      * @param   string                          The name of the called method
00207      * @param   array                           The arguments for the called method
00208      * @return  mixed                           The result of the PDO method called
00209      * @throws  tx_oop_Template_File_Exception  If the called method does not exist
00210      */
00211     public function __call( $name, array $args = array() )
00212     {
00213         // Checks if the method can be called
00214         if( !is_callable( array( $this->_smarty, $name ) ) ) {
00215             
00216             // Called method does not exist
00217             throw new tx_oop_Template_File_Exception(
00218                 'The method \'' . $name . '\' cannot be called on the Smarty object',
00219                 tx_oop_Template_File_Exception::EXCEPTION_BAD_METHOD
00220             );
00221         }
00222         
00223         // Gets the number of arguments
00224         $argCount = count( $args );
00225         
00226         // Checks the number of arguments, to avoid using the call_user_func_array() function
00227         switch( $argCount ) {
00228             
00229             case 0:
00230                 
00231                 return $this->_smarty->$name();
00232                 break;
00233             
00234             case 1:
00235                 
00236                 return $this->_smarty->$name( $args[ 0 ] );
00237                 break;
00238             
00239             case 2:
00240                 
00241                 return $this->_smarty->$name( $args[ 0 ], $args[ 1 ] );
00242                 break;
00243             
00244             case 3:
00245                 
00246                 return $this->_smarty->$name( $args[ 0 ], $args[ 1 ], $args[ 2 ] );
00247                 break;
00248             
00249             case 4:
00250                 
00251                 return $this->_smarty->$name( $args[ 0 ], $args[ 1 ], $args[ 2 ], $args[ 3 ] );
00252                 break;
00253                 break;
00254             
00255             case 5:
00256                 
00257                 return $this->_smarty->$name( $args[ 0 ], $args[ 1 ], $args[ 2 ], $args[ 3 ] , $args[ 4 ] );
00258                 break;
00259             
00260             default:
00261                 
00262                 return call_user_func_array( $this->_smarty, $args );
00263                 break;
00264         }
00265     }
00266 }
